name: Reddit Redesign [Night Mode]
description: Native night mode, with few tweaks.
additional_info: >version 3.0 This is now an extension to beautify the Native Nigh Mode on reddit redesign. version 2.3 >sidebar adverts fixed >sidebar color highlight change >minor bugs version 2.2.1 >sidebar border >sorting border >minor bug fixes version 2.2 >>May 7th, 2018 update<< >Style has been completely customized for /r/fuckthesepeople users version 2.1.1 >07/04 fancy pants editor options color change >comments with borders >bug fixes version 2.1 >header colors fix implemented version 2.0 >comments highlighted for coherency >quoted text now even more easy to spot >completely re-written with top banner and search fields differentiated >subreddit banners on some major subs should now not blank out >color contrast improved >best, hot, etc drop down menu now easily visible > Promoted posts will be now carry red tag to distinguish ;) If you find any issues browsing, immediately let me know here or /u/doorbellguy on reddit. Just PM me. Thanks for using! **** version 1.3 font-issues minor tweaks on UI transparency new.reddit.com --> reddit.com since more users have ported over version 1.2.1 >fixed link to support theme for new.reddit.com version 1.2 >theme only applies to reddit now version 1.1 >fixed text box color >visited link color are now differentiated version 1.0
